alert.note: Alert for Panola; Shelby (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 5:37PM CST until February 04 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Areas of light rain and freezing rain will move across Panola and Shelby Counties through mid evening, which will create light ice accumulations of up to several hundreths of an inch on elevated objects such as trees and power lines, bridges and overpasses. * WHERE...Panola and Shelby Counties. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
